x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Ensure a transparent, efficient, and ethical supply chain in dairy goods.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Flow Context - Have a clear trace of workflow stages in the supply chain or production line.
Assessment Matrix - Match the farmers to nearby trusted distributors to arrange collection of goods
Scheduled Triggers - Regular/base payment to farmer to sustain their business operations. Pre-agreed reward scheme on a good harvest season.
Knowledge Article / Announcement - Transparent, standardized pricing release across the marketplace, Updates on news of crop infestation around the region if any, and practical tips to optimize produce or high value output.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

GPS Tracker/Declaration to locate farmer and distributor location.
Reliable news channel to feed into the Announcement via news aggregator.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Simplified app for farmers, production workers.
A means for mediation in case of dispute.
